main: ^Hey, I got a business proposition for you!
^Remember the board I told you about?
clarify: ^It's the board I place all my special orders on...
section1: ^So here's my offer, everyday I'll put up some items I need for my orders.
^And if you deliver them, I'll give you 3 times their normal price, just like before.
section2: ^Well the board's right here, you can come up to me should you want to make some extra coin!
